title: Scenario: Logos and images appear readable and retina/non-retina
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
custom_steps:
When the splash screen dismisses
and the Welcome/Login Screen loads
custom_expected:
Then the images (logos, banners, etc) will be readable
And appear correctly for retina/non-retina devices

title: Text
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
custom_steps:
When the splash screen dismisses
and the Welcome/Login Screen loads
custom_expected: Then all text should be clear, grammatically correct and readable

title: Links
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
custom_steps:
When the splash screen dismisses
and the Welcome/Login Screen loads
custom_expected: Then the links to privacy policy, terms and conditions work as expected

title: Enter 'How to Play' screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
custom_steps:
When the splash screen dismisses
and the Welcome/Login Screen loads
and the user taps the 'How to Play' button (Question mark) in the upper right
custom_expected:
Then the "How to Play" screen will contain a description of gameplay details hosted in a webview
And the description will be readable, clear and contain no grammatical errors

title: Exit 'How to Play' screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
custom_steps:
When the splash screen dismisses
and the Welcome/Login Screen loads
and the user taps the 'How to Play' button (Question mark) in the upper right
custom_expected: Then when the user hits the 'back/done' button they should be returned to the Welcome/Login screen

title: 'Sign In' button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
custom_steps:
When the splash screen dismisses
and the Welcome/Login Screen loads
and the user taps the 'Sign In' button
custom_expected:
Then the login screen will load
And the top of the page will read 'Account Login'
And the user will be provided the option to 'Login with MLB.com'
And the login page will have a field for email/password
And the login page will have a link to the forget password flow
And the login page will have a link to the privacy policy
And the login page will have a link to MLB.com
And the login page will have a link to the terms and conditions
And the login page will have a back button
And all the text on the login page will be clear, readable and grammatically correct
And all the images will be available in retina/non-retina

title: 'Register' button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
custom_steps:
When the splash screen dismisses
and the Welcome/Login Screen loads
and the user taps 'Register' button
custom_expected:
Then the register screen will load
And the register page will have a field for email
And the register page will have a field for nickname
And the register page will have a field for password
And the register page will have a field for confirm password
And the register page will have a field for birthday
And the register page will have a 'Register' button
And the register page will have a link to the privacy policy
And the register page will have a link to the terms and conditions
And the register page will have a back button
And all the text on the register page will be clear, readable and grammatically correct
And all the images will be available in retina/non-retina

title: Back button on Account Login page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps 'Sign In' button
custom_steps:
When the login screen loads
And the user taps the 'Back' button in the top left nav
custom_expected: Then the user will be returned to the welcome screen

title: Links to privacy policy, terms and conditions
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps 'Sign In' button
custom_steps:
When the login screen loads
And the user taps the privacy policy, terms and conditions links
custom_expected:
Then each page will load as expected
And the pages will be readable, clear and grammatically correct

title: User enters an invalid email address and attempts to login
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps 'Sign In' button
custom_steps:
When the user enters an invalid email address 
And attempts to login
custom_expected:
Then the user is given an expected error message
And the error message is free of grammatical errors

title: User enters an invalid password and attempts to login
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps 'Sign In' button
custom_steps:
When the user enters an invalid password 
And attempts to login
custom_expected:
Then the user is given an expected error message (Invalid Email/Password.)
And the error message is free of grammatical errors

title: User enters valid MLBAM credentials and attempts to login
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps the 'Sign In' button
custom_steps:
When the user enters valid credentials
And attempts to login
custom_expected:
Then login is successful
And the user is taken to the My Profile tab

title: User taps 'Forget Password?' link
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps 'Sign In' button
custom_steps:
When the login screen loads
And the user taps the 'Forget Password?' link
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Forgot Password initial page

title: User engages 'Forget Password?' flow
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps the 'Sign In' button
And the user taps the 'Forget Password?' link
And the user is taken to the Forgot Password initial page
custom_steps:
When the user enters a valid MLBAM email address
And requests a new password
custom_expected: Then the user will receive a new password via the email address that was used to request it

title: User attempts to login with newly requested password
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps the 'Sign In' button
And the user taps the 'Forget Password?' link
And the user is taken to the Forgot Password initial page
And the user enters a valid MLBAM email address
And requests a new password
custom_steps:
When the user accesses the Welcome screen 
And taps 'Sign In'
And enters the email address
And enters the newly generated password
custom_expected:
Then the user successfully logs in
And the user is taken to the 'Challenges' tab

title: User attempts to sign in without entering an email/password
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps 'Sign In' button
custom_steps:
When the user does not enter an email/password
And taps 'Login with MLB.com'
custom_expected:
Then the user is given an expected error message
And the error message is free of grammatical errors

title: User attempts to login - login services fail
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps 'Sign In' button
custom_steps:
When the user enters a valid email/password combination
And the user taps  'Login with MLB.com'
And the login services fail
custom_expected:
Then the user is given an expected error message
And the error message is free of grammatical errors

and the user taps 'Register' button
custom_steps:

and the user taps the 'Register' button

title: User attempts to register without entering any text in the Confirm Password field
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps the 'Register' button
custom_steps:
When the user does not enter a confirmation password
And attempts to register
custom_expected:
Then the user will be unable to select the Register button
and the Register button will appear as read-only

title: User attempts to register with an invalid birthday
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user was not previously logged into Facebook
And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps the 'Register' button
custom_steps:
When the user enters an invalid birthday (user is under 13 years of age)
And attempts to register
custom_expected:
Then the user is given an expected error message
And the error message is free of grammatical errors

title: User enters all valid information an attempts to register
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app

And the user was not previously logged into BAMNET
and the user taps 'Register' button
custom_steps:
When the user enters valid credentials
And attempts to login
custom_expected:
Then login is successful
And the user is taken to the Challenges tab of the application

title: User attempts to register - registration services fail
custom_preconds:

and the user taps 'Register' button
